# How to change DNS settings on Android

  1. Go to Settings and open Network & internet

  1. Open Wi-Fi

  1. Press setting icon

  1. Press Advanced

  1. Remember your IP address, Gateway and Subnet mask, then press the setting icon

  1. Find IP settings and change to Static

  1. Input your IP address, Gateway, Network prefix length and DNS.SB's servers
185.222.222.222
45.11.45.11

Note: If this guide doesn't work, ask your geek friend for help.
